name: Prison Runner
description:
Prison Runner is a brand new endless running game. 

Run from police and jump or slide obstacles

Prison Runner is an ideal game for adventurous spirits with beautiful 3D graphics and captivating game play. 

The only way to survive is keep jumping and running forward. It creates fun time for players to escape from the prison. 

The unstoppable game style reflexes well the challenges, grow stronger with your character as you keep moving forward to survive and find the exit!

Features:-

+ 3D graphics with amusing style

+ Smooth control 

+ Beautiful game scene – with awesome game environment

+ Multiple Power Ups – Don't miss it!

+ Stunning visualization and silky smooth animation.

+ Awesome power-ups, special items

+ Simple and fun mechanics.

+ Good for pass time
